Global

Members

backBoneSync

Overwrite to default Backbone.sync function. Our implementation executes some custom events based on Backbone.sync.methodMap (created, update, delete, patch).

Methods

abbreviateNumberNoDecimal()

Abbreviates a number using K, MM, and B depending on the quantity, without decimal places

append()

Append a string to a sentence (good for apending a class)

capitalize()

Capitalize first letter of a string

formatDate()

Formats a date on MM/DD/YYYY way

formatNumber()

Formats a number to be separated by commas.

formatNumberOneDecimal()

Formats a number into one decimal place

formatNumberPercentage()

Formats a number and add % symbol at the end

generateChart()

Generates the chart.

prepend()

Prepends a string to a sentence (good for prepending a class)
